FuncDef: The display diameter-group bind-info command displays the bindings between AAA domains and Diameter server groups.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an AAA domain that is bound to a Diameter server group.
The AAA domain specified in the command must be an existing one. If no AAA domain name is specified in the command, the bindings between all AAA domains and Diameter server groups will be displayed in the command output.
The name is a string of 1 to 64 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display diameter-group bind-info command displays the bindings between AAA domains and Diameter server groups.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
